newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: SOUTH AFRICA'S STALS SATISFIED WITH INTEREST RATES.
newsitem.headline: SOUTH AFRICA'S STALS SATISFIED WITH INTEREST RATES.

text.p: Chris Stals, governor of the South African Reserve Bank, said the central bank was satisfied with the current level of interest rates in the country.
"Our interest rates are extremely high...and we are satisfied with rates as they are," Stals told reporters following a presentation to Swiss investors.
He said there was clear evidence of a slowdown in real economic activity at the present and in the rate of increase in money supply growth.
